body:
Hi All,


It took me a few hours to upload it, and another hour to tweak it,  
but I've finally put the 2008 Radiance workshop CD online:


	http://www.radiance-online.org/radiance-workshop7/


I've also linked it into the main radiance-online web page with the  
others.


Let me know if you spot any issues.


Cheers,
-Greg
